email_content:
Dear Mrs. Thompson,

I hope you’re well. As requested, here is the latest update on Timmy’s health:

• Asthma: We have been monitoring Timmy’s asthma closely. His physician recently adjusted the dosage of his controller inhaler, and his breathing has been stable.
• Pneumonia: Timmy has fully recovered from his recent bout of pneumonia and shows no lingering symptoms.
• Management Plan: He will continue daily use of his inhaled corticosteroid (Flovent 110 mcg, two puffs twice daily) and will keep his rescue inhaler (albuterol) with him at school. We are also tracking his peak-flow readings nightly (currently ~95 % of his personal best) and avoiding known triggers such as dust and pollen.
• Next Appointment: Timmy’s next follow-up with the pediatric pulmonologist is scheduled for March 5.

Please let me know if you need any additional information or documentation. Thank you for helping us keep Timmy healthy and safe while he’s at school.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
